amendment.description: Amendment requires that the State educational agency which provides waivers for local school districts be satisfied that the underlying purposes of the statutory requirements of each program for which a waiver is granted continue to be met.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to require that the State educational agency insures that the purposes of the statutory requirements of each program for which a waiver is granted continue to be met.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 13 (Roll no. 38).
